tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vpn_connections (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    connection_status TEXT,
    connection_time TIMESTAMP,
    uptime_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE vpn_uptime (
    user_id INT,
    connection_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    uptime_minutes INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES vpn_connections(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (connection_id) REFERENCES vpn_connections(id)
);

CREATE TABLE vpn_users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
vpn_ip VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
connected BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
last_connection TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE vpn_sessions (session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
user_id INT NOT NULL,
start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
end_time TIMESTAMP,
status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE vpn_logs(log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
session_id INT NOT NULL,
log_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
log_message TEXT)

CREATE TABLE vpn_connections (
    connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    server_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE vpn_connections (
    connection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    server_id UUID,
    connection_start TIMESTAMP,
    connection_end TIMESTAMP,
    status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE vpn_usage_stats (
    stats_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    connection_id UUID,
    data_transfer BIGINT,
    uptime_seconds BIGINT
);
